t: Why the 'Amazon coat' from this Chinese brand is a hit with US consumers
s: February 26, 2019 - A $129.99 winter coat by Chinese fashion label Orolay has become a number one best-seller on Amazon, becoming so popular it is now known as the "Amazon coat," after going viral on social media. The Women's Thickened Down Jacket has been reviewed more than 6,000 times on the e-commerce site ...

t: I tried the internet-famous 'Amazon Coat' to see if it lives up to the hype — after wearing it during a Maine cold snap, I can officially say that it does
s: January 6, 2023 - At the risk of sounding like an aging hipster, I'm not necessarily someone who participates in trends when they happen. So even though I read all of the tweets and think pieces about the Orolay Thickened Down Jacket — or as the internet has dubbed it the "Amazon Coat" — I never added it ...

t: How a coat on Amazon took over a neighborhood — and then the internet
s: February 25, 2019 - The Amazon coat, it should be noted, is not cool. It’s fine. It’s slightly oversized, hooded, and comes in muted colors like olive green, black, navy, and cream. There are square-shaped pockets and paneling on the front, which one coat owner attributed to the influence of Balenciaga.

t: Chinese Brand Made the “Amazon Coat” - Marketplace Pulse
s: February 5, 2019 - The #1 best selling product in Clothing on Amazon is a winter coat. Unsurprising, it is winter after all. But it's not made by Canada Goose or any other major clothing brand. Nor is it one of the private label brands Amazon has launched. Instead, it is made by Orolay, a company no one has heard ...

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.
